name: Leviathan (itch) (acellular)
description:
Play as the minor deity of an evolving farming society.

Spread your dogmas. Punish with fire and pestilence. Reward with bees. Try to keep the fickle humans from destroying themselves. (Or destroy them yourself.)

Credit to the many users of freesound.org who release public domain sounds.

Please note: this game is a work in progress and the underlying simulation can be fairly CPU intensive. If I am able with limited time, some future features might include: raiding and wars, evolving hierarchical entities (city states and countries), weather, a more complex ritual creation system and more god powers.
